work_experience.job_title: AI Scientist â€“ Generative Insights & Clustering Specialist
key_responsibilities: Engineered a robust NLP data pipeline leveraging the GPT-4o mini API for PII reduction and data cleaning, combined with intfloat/e5 embeddings in Weaviate to enable advanced clustering.
Developed a hybrid geospatial visualization system using ArcGIS Pro and Deck.gl to create interactive maps of complex cluster relationships and topological data.
Fine-tuned generative AI models to analyze, summarize, and synthesize multi-source corporate data (tickets, emails, meetings) into actionable summaries and recommendations.
Developed a frontend-based AI proctoring solution using TensorFlow.js and WebGPU.
Developed a facial recognition system using Siamese Neural Networks for a B2B AI-driven interview platform.

projects.name: GenAgent-Personalized-Career-Assistant-Powered-by-Agentic-AI
projects.description: Architected a full-stack AI career assistant (FastAPI, Streamlit) providing data-driven resume feedback and job application tools. Engineered a multi-feature platform using LLM agents (GPT-4) for resume analysis, rewriting, and cover letter generation. Containerized the application using Docker, ensuring reproducible builds and simplifying deployment.

projects.name: AI Medical Chatbot Using Llama 2
projects.description: Engineered a RAG medical chatbot using Llama 2 and LangChain to provide accurate answers from a PDF knowledge base. Implemented a FAISS vector database.

projects.name: AI Large-Scale Candidate Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a scalable candidate-job matching system using GPT-4o mini and advanced prompt engineering. Built a resume parsing pipeline to minimize input size.

publications.title: EduNote: AI-Powered Cultural and Location-Based Note Generation from Images
publications.description: Developed an AI tool to transform images of landmarks into travel notes using a fine-tuned DenseNet121 model and APIs (Wikipedia, TripAdvisor). Optimized the model and used LLaMA3-70B for text generation.
